duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee daily management of staff, including IC1, IC2 technicians.
Coach and mentor staff to achieve high quality results and high performance.
Adhere to and apply the disciplinary process related to staff performance issues.
Screen and schedule burst labor resources for short term projects.
Collaborate and share best practices with Data Center Leads in other locations.
Assist in the onboarding and training of all new hires.
Provides explanations for operational performance results.
Manage local morale budget to ensure team morale is high.
Screen for technical capabilities and cultural fit then recommend hire of long term resources.
Other duties as assigned by management.
